committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice

official_title: To amend Section 410(b)(1)(A) of the Controlled Substances Act, to provide a mandatory term of life imprisonment without release, probation, parole or suspension of sentencing for drug felons and violent criminals convicted a third time.

summary.text: Amends the Controlled Substances Act to provide a mandatory term of life imprisonment without release, probation, parole, or suspension of sentencing for committing a crime of violence after two or more prior convictions for a felony drug offense, a crime of violence, or any combination thereof.

titles.title: To amend Section 410(b)(1)(A) of the Controlled Substances Act, to provide a mandatory term of life imprisonment without release, probation, parole or suspension of sentencing for drug felons and violent criminals convicted a third time.
